contentList.content: Mist Walk
Surrounded by the Mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see.
Mist Walk

You gain the ability to Mist Walk, allowing you to teleport short distances. By spending a Charge, you may teleport to another empty space you can see within your Mist Walk distance. Using Mist Walk does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
Unarmoured Defence

The Mist protects you by warning you of attacks. While not wearing armour, you add your Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
Mist Walk Charges
Mist Walk Determines how many times you may cast Mist Walk per turn
Unarmoured Defence
While not wearing armour, you add your Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
Additional Mist Walk Charge
You can now Mist Walk more times per Turn.
Mist Walker

To be counted among those who can walk the mists is no easy feat and as such, Mist Walkers are incredibly dedicated warriors. Focusing their mind to absorb the entirety of their surroundings they track their enemies and engage them at blinding speeds— often from behind.
Shroud Points
You have tapped further into the secrets of Mist, giving you access to manifest and manipulate it as a tangible force, called the Shroud.
Mist Walker

To be counted among those who can walk the mists is no easy feat and as such, Mist Walkers are incredibly dedicated warriors. Focusing their mind to absorb the entirety of their surroundings they track their enemies and engage them at blinding speeds— often from behind.
Darkness
Create a dark shroud that Heavily Obscures and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinds</LSTag> creatures within. Creatures cannot make ranged attacks into or out of it.
